intro.description: The following steps show how to use a simple Probe tool to display a process variable.

item.title: Close Probe
item.description: Use the cross in the Probe tab to close the tool.

item.title: Select the sine signal using autocomplete
item.description:
Start typing 's' in PV field, the autocomplete should propose previously entered PV.
Select it and type Enter.

item.title: Move Probe around
item.description: Move Probe to other view area. Resize the view.

item.title: Close Probe
item.description: Use the cross in the Probe tab to close the tool.

item.title: For more information
item.description: Click on the Question Mark on the right to open related help.
